text:
Clean and easy to navigate.

Have a family toilet inside wherein you can use it.

The escalator is above normal height so if you are scared with heights please use the elevator ðŸ›— for your own safety specially elderly.

Newly opened Katong MRT station, looks amazing, but disappointed that there are no shops inside...not even a 7eleven. The station has a large open air bike rack out the back, a good 3 parking taxi stand.
I was surprised how deep the station was, with large open spaces.

Spectacular station that will wow you with its depth and vastness. Its an amazing engineering feat that underscores itâ€™s interior beauty with its selection of materials, play of massing, and contrast of elements.
I'm a visitor from Australia and I'm very impressed by the size of this and all the stations we have seen and visited. The signs are very easy to follow and the staff extremely courteous and helpful.
This Station Was Opened in 21 June 2024
